title: Charles Moussa

summary: During QHack 2023, we implemented with Pennylane a resource frugal optimizer named Refoqus from the paper [Resource frugal optimizer for quantum machine learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.04965). We show how to apply it across 3 QML applications on quantum datasets.
title: Adaptative VQA Optimizers

summary: The results of the paper [Hyperparameter Importance of Quantum Neural Networks Across Small Datasets](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-031-18840-4_3). This work has also been extended to include an extra set of experiments assessing the usefulness of using priors of good hyperparameter values of Quantum Neural Networks for hyperparameter optimization.
title: Hyperparameter Importance of Quantum Neural Networks Across Small Datasets
